mapper.select: select case when b.user_id = #{userID} then 'true' else 'false' end as is_registered ,count(1) as registered_count ,coalesce(a.event_detail,'') as event_detail ,coalesce(c.nickname,concat(substr(c.phone,1,3),'****',substr(c.phone,8)) ) as organizer_name ,coalesce(concat(substr(c.phone,1,3),'****',substr(c.phone,8)),'') as phone ,coalesce(c.profile_picture,'') as profile_image ,coalesce(d.user_level,'99') as organizer_level from event a left join event_registration b on a.event_id = b.event_id and b.event_id = #{eventID} left join user_info c on a.organizer_id = c.user_id left join user_detail d on c.user_id = d.user_id where a.event_id = #{eventID}
select event_id as event_id ,organizer_id as organizer_id ,event_name as event_name from event where club_id = #{club_id}

select t1.event_id ,t1.event_name ,t1.club_id ,t1.start_time ,t1.end_time ,t1.register_start_time ,t1.register_end_time ,t1.organizer_id ,t1.event_address ,t1.min_people ,t1.max_people ,t1.fee ,t1.image ,t1.event_status ,t1.view_guests ,t1.form_item ,t1.event_detail ,t1.event_notice from event t1 left join ( select a.event_id , count(b.user_id) as member_cnt from event a left join event_registration b on a.event_id = b.event_id where a.club_id = #{club_id} group by a.event_id )t2 on t1.event_id = t2.event_id left join event_registration t3 on t1.event_id = t3.event_id and t3.user_id = #{userID} and t3.my_status = 1 where t1.club_id = #{club_id} and t1.register_start_time < now() and t1.register_end_time > NOW() and (t1.max_people > t2.member_cnt or coalesce(t1.max_people,0) = 0 ) ORDER BY t1.start_time desc LIMIT 2

select a.event_id ,a.club_id ,b.item_code ,coalesce(c.item_name,'') as item_name ,coalesce(d.item_value, case when b.item_code = 'name' then e.user_real_name when b.item_code = 'mobile' then e.phone else null end ,'') as item_value from event a left join event_form b on a.event_id = b.event_id left join event_form_item c on b.item_code = c.item_code left join user_info e on e.user_id = #{userID} left join user_profile d on b.item_code = d.item_code and d.user_id = e.user_id where a.event_id = #{eventID} order by c.index

select b.event_id ,b.club_id ,b.end_time ,b.event_address ,b.event_name ,b.event_status ,coalesce(b.fee,0.0) as fee ,b.form_item ,concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(b.image,'')) as image ,coalesce(b.max_people,0) as max_people ,coalesce(b.min_people,0) as min_people ,b.organizer_id ,b.register_end_time ,b.register_start_time ,b.start_time ,b.view_guests from event_registration a LEFT JOIN event b on a.event_id = b.event_id where a.user_id =#{user_id} and a.my_status = 1 and b.club_id = #{club_id}

select a.event_id ,a.club_id ,a.end_time ,a.event_address ,a.event_name ,a.event_status ,coalesce(a.fee,0.0) as fee ,a.form_item ,concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(a.image,'')) as image ,coalesce(a.max_people,0) as max_people ,coalesce(a.min_people,0) as min_people ,a.organizer_id ,a.register_end_time ,a.register_start_time ,a.start_time ,a.view_guests from event a where a.club_id = #{club_id} and a.organizer_id = #{user_id}

select a.event_id ,a.club_id ,a.end_time ,a.event_address ,a.event_name ,a.event_status ,coalesce(a.fee,0.0) as fee ,a.form_item ,concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(a.image,'')) as image ,coalesce(a.max_people,0) as max_people ,coalesce(a.min_people,0) as min_people ,a.organizer_id ,a.register_end_time ,a.register_start_time ,a.start_time ,a.view_guests from event a where a.event_status = 0 and a.club_id = #{club_id}
select COUNT(1) evnets_count from event a where a.club_id = #{clubID}

select coalesce(b.nickname,concat(substr(b.phone,1,3),'****',substr(b.phone,8)) ) as name ,b.profile_picture as profile_image ,concat(substr(b.phone,1,3),'****',substr(b.phone,8)) as phone from event_registration a left join user_info b on a.user_id = b.user_id where a.event_id = #{eventID}
select COUNT(1) as counts from event a where a.event_status = 0 and a.club_id = #{club_id}
select a.item_code ,a.item_name ,a.is_default ,a.language ,a.index from event_form_item a ORDER BY a.index
select a.id ,concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(a.image,'')) as image ,a.index from event_image a ORDER BY a.index
